root_ranger.title: Path of the Ranger
root_ranger.description:
§8You use your superior agility and bow to take enemies out efficiently and quietly. Follow this path to become a lethal hunter. 

§aGet experience in this tree by getting ranged kills

superior-strings.title: Superior Strings
superior-strings.description:
§8Your string is a lot more elastic.
§8Wait no that's not what I- 

§a+5% Bow Draw speed

ranged_damage.title: Sharper Tips
ranged_damage.description:
§8You sharpen your arrow tips. Cavemen are proud of you.


§a+3% Arrow Damage

arrow_velocity.title: Wind-blessed Arrows
arrow_velocity.description:
§8Your arrows are blessed by the godess of the wind and meet their targets sooner.

§a+10% Arrow Velocity

dodge.title: Dodgy
dodge.description:
§8You dodge hits suspiciously well.

§a+10% Dodge Chance

luck.title: Lucky
luck.description:
§8You must be a punk because you're feeling lucky.

§a+0.25 Luck

scavenger.title: Scavenger
scavenger.description:
§8It's a good thing you grew up watching those survivalist youtube videos.

§a+3% Stamina Efficiency

crit_chance.title: Head Hunter
crit_chance.description:
§8Through trial and error, you have learnt that aiming for the head generates greater returns.

§a+5% Critical Chance

sprint1.title: Sunday Sprinter
sprint1.description:
§8There are worse things for your health than sprinting once a week.

§a+5% Movement Speed

sprint2.title: Monday Marathoner
sprint2.description:
§8How else would you start a great week than with your favourite activity.

§a+10% Movement Speed

crit_damage.title: It's over 5%!
crit_damage.description:
§8Sometimes your hits do more damage.
§8Now they do even more damage when that happens.

§a+5% Critical Damage

back_stabber.title: Back Stabber
back_stabber.description:
§8Look at you being all original.The front wasn't good enough for you?

§a+10% Backstab Damage

speed_stabber.title: Speed Stabber
speed_stabber.description:
§8How many stabs could a stabber stab if a stabber could stab you?

§a+10% Attack Speed

versatile.title: Versatile
versatile.description:
§8You're so used to using people, you've become proficient at using items too!

§a+10% Item use Speed
